name: Lost in a Memory
description:
From Team TheDarkOnes we proudly present our submission for the Senscape Adventurous Jam. 

A short journey through a forgetful mind as you try rediscover what is lost.

Work your way through fragments of memories to find out what's really happening.

Team DarkOnes
